text: Christian Louboutin (; born 7 January 1963) is a French footwear designer. His signature is the red soles on the high-heeled womens shoes he designs. Louboutin's shoes were named the "Most Prestigious Women's Shoes" in 2007, 2008, and 2009. In 2011, Louboutin became the most searched-for shoe brand online. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Businesspeople from Paris Category:French fashion designers Category:LGBT fashion designers Category:French LGBT people Category:Footwear Category:Living people
title: Christian Louboutin
